title: UX / UI Design
content: As a creative designer, I believe that well-defined problems and an understanding of customers' needs start with empathy.

title: Design Systems
content: I create memorable brand experiences in all types of systems to be both beautiful, functional, and accessible.

title: Interaction Design
content: I sue design thinking to turn effective and delightful low and high fidelity design work into masterpieces.

title: Visual Design
content: My goal is to work with a high attention to details and a wide set of skills to maintain product design vision.
